overview: Filmmaker Marco Aluia captures the buzz as more than a million fans flock to Detroit to catch dozens of electronic music's biggest stars, from seminal art-funk group ESG to local electronic jazz favorite John Arnold. The documentary also features interviews with many of the performers, a festival fashion show and a look at some of the technology behind the event's spectacular visuals. Detroit techno pioneer Derrick May produced the 2004 event.
title: Movement '04: Detroit's Electronic Music Festival
